/.slogan: Finally a really simple website editor that works.

/.footer: The first inline WYSIWYG editor you can simply use anywhere, any time. It works with any CMS, such as Wordpress, Drupal. It works with Magento. It even works without a CMS or database. Simply Edit Anything.
